translation.welcome_message: Hi, nice to meet you, I'm
translation.about_text:
Close to 2 years as a remote full-stack web developer.
 Able to take requirements and give possible solutions to customer's. Open to new ideas to develop a certain feaute. Appreciate feedback and take it into consideration.

 I'm ready to give you my best. 
 From Punta Arenas, Chile.
